TopicTitle: smart55, hard55, or are you a bad55 ?

Articles.Content:
More of a smart55 then a hard55, but way more bad55 then a hard55.

limits of I = 2S>H , H<3B

I think he means hardass, smartass, and badass, and tried to Kerbalize it without realizing the tag in KSP is BadS=1 for Jeb, not Bad55. (Though it may be badS and not BadS)

For that I award, the OP a value of DumbS=1

Sorry man, had to.

For the record I also have H and 3B drafting pencils at home.

Edited October 15, 2014 by EdFred

I think he means hardass, smartass, and badass, and tried to Kerbalize it without realizing the tag in KSP is BadS=1 for Jeb, not Bad55. (Though it may be badS and not BadS)

For that I award, the OP a value of DumbS=1

Sorry man, had to.

For the record I also have H and 3B drafting pencils at home.

It was based on the not so close shade of kerbal colour code bada55 and from charcter traits in Wasteland2. Spelling it wrong was fairly dumb of me thats why my S is lower than my B. The BadS=1 just shows logic , a true or false condition and contains no integer value.

As for definitions, well, do you really need them? This is just for fun.
I am a Closing55. (Do try to have a purpose for threads, or if they have a purpose, please make it clearer. )
